languages.text: {n}Рыжеволосая бывшая бунтарка опускается рядом на мостовую, заливаясь слезами.{/n} "Да когда же это закончится... когда... Я хочу домо-о-ой!"
{n}The red-haired ex-rebel sits down on the pavement, tears running down her face.{/n} "When will this end already... when... I wanna go hooome!"
languages.original_text: {n}Рыжеволосая бывшая бунтарка опускается рядом на мостовую, заливаясь слезами.{/n} "Да когда же это закончится... когда... Я хочу домо-о-ой!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The red-haired former rebel sits down on the pavement, tears running down her face.{/n} "When will this end already... when... I wanna go hooome!"
{n}The red-haired former rebel sits down on the pavement, tears running down her face.{/n} "When will this end already... when... I wanna go hooome!"
{n}The red-haired ex-rebel sits down on the pavement, tears running down her face.{/n} "When will this end already... when... I wanna go ho-o-ome!"

languages.text: {n}Die rothaarige Ex-Rebellin setzt sich auf den Boden. Tränen strömen über ihr Gesicht.{/n} "Wann hat das alles endlich ein Ende ... wann ... Ich will nach Hau-au-ause!"
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired ex-rebel sits down on the pavement, tears running down her face.{/n} "When will this end already... when... I wanna go hooome!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die rothaarige Ex-Rebellin setzt sich auf den Boden. Tränen strömen über ihr Gesicht.{/n} "Wann hat das alles endlich ein Ende ... wann ... Ich will nach Hau-au-ause!"

languages.text: {n}L'ancienne rebelle aux cheveux roux est assise par terre, des larmes roulant sur son visage.{/n} « Quand est-ce que ça va s'arrêter ?... Quand ?... Je veux rentrer chez moi ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired ex-rebel sits down on the pavement, tears running down her face.{/n} "When will this end already... when... I wanna go hooome!"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'ancienne rebelle aux cheveux roux est assise par terre, des larmes roulant sur son visage.{/n} « Quand est-ce que ça va s'arrêter ?... Quand ?... Je veux rentrer chez moi ! »

languages.text: {n}曾经为叛军效力的红发女人一屁股坐在人行道上，眼泪顺着脸流了下来。{/n}“这一切到底什么时候才会结束……什么时候……我……我想回家！”
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired ex-rebel sits down on the pavement, tears running down her face.{/n} "When will this end already... when... I wanna go hooome!"

traits.locale_text: {n}曾经为叛军效力的红发女人一屁股坐在人行道上，眼泪顺着脸流了下来。{/n}“这一切到底什么时候才会结束……什么时候……我……我想回家！”

languages.text: {n}歩道に座り込み、赤毛の元反乱者の顔を涙が伝う。{/n}「いつになったら終わるの…いつ…帰りたいよぉぉぉ！」
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired ex-rebel sits down on the pavement, tears running down her face.{/n} "When will this end already... when... I wanna go hooome!"

traits.locale_text: {n}歩道に座り込み、赤毛の元反乱者の顔を涙が伝う。{/n}「いつになったら終わるの…いつ…帰りたいよぉぉぉ！」

languages.text: {n}La ex-rebelde pelirroja se sienta en la acera, con lágrimas cayendo por su rostro.{/n} «¿Cuándo terminará esto... cuando... ¡Quiero irme a casaaa!».
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired ex-rebel sits down on the pavement, tears running down her face.{/n} "When will this end already... when... I wanna go hooome!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La ex-rebelde pelirroja se sienta en la acera, con lágrimas cayendo por su rostro.{/n} «¿Cuándo terminará esto... cuando... ¡Quiero irme a casaaa!».

languages.text: {n}Kızıl saçlı eski isyancı, kaldırıma çöküyor. Gözyaşları yüzünden aşağı süzülüyor.{/n} "Bu çile ne zaman sona erecek? Ne zaman? Eve dönmek istiyorum!"
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired ex-rebel sits down on the pavement, tears running down her face.{/n} "When will this end already... when... I wanna go hooome!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kızıl saçlı eski isyancı, kaldırıma oturuyor; gözyaşları yüzünden usulca süzülüyor.{/n} "Bu çile ne zaman sona erecek?.. Artık... Eve gitmek istiyorum!"
